project.name: Programming Assignment 1: WordNet
project.description: The task is to build the wordnet digraph: each vertex v is an integer that represents a synset, and each directed edge vâ†’w represents that w is a hypernym of v. The wordnet digraph is a rooted DAG: it is acylic and has one vertex that is an ancestor of every other vertex. However, it is not necessarily a tree because a synset can have more than one hypernym.
